forum.name: bugs and glitches
forum.description: post bugs and glitches you find here
forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: cannot merge parts despite being clonable

comments.text: i made a thing for a friend to use, made sure it was clonable by others. yet he was not able to include those parts, he could only include as sub things. annoying.
thanks for the report! this might happen when the thing he's editing already includes a clone history (i.e. was edited by someone else too), as we currently don't support...
... multiple credits/ branches in the edit history, but we understand adding that would be a much welcomed feature!

thread.latestCommentText: ... multiple credits/ branches in the edit history, but we understand adding that would be a much welcomed feature!
